title: Upwork Jobs Scraper
description: Extract freelance job postings from Upwork. Search by keyword, filter by job type and experience level, and get comprehensive job details including budgets, skills, and client information.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Upwork search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword and other filters.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Search term for jobs. Examples: 'web scraping', 'data entry', 'graphic design', 'python developer'

jobType.title: Job Type
jobType.description: Filter by contract type: hourly or fixed-price.

hourlyRateMin.title: Minimum Hourly Rate
hourlyRateMin.description: Minimum hourly rate in USD (for hourly jobs only).

hourlyRateMax.title: Maximum Hourly Rate
hourlyRateMax.description: Maximum hourly rate in USD (for hourly jobs only).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Details
collectDetails.description: Extract comprehensive job details including descriptions, client info, and requirements.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
